attributes.additional_details:
High risk neuroblastoma has up to 80% relapse rate if cured the first time and the UK don't have no relapse treatment.
Treatment can be given abroad for relapse patients, which goes to show something can be done, if you have the money to it, at the moment, the min the treatment costs is £500k which for the average every day person is more than they would make in a lifetime, Tax payers pay for the NHS yet, we fund drugs for drug addicts, who choose to poison their bodies, yet we cant save the life of a child who didnt ask for this nasty disease unless they can raise an absurd amount of money, something needs to be done, priorities need to be made, and the NHS needs to rethink their structure when it comes to childhood illness's, I have set this petition up to try and make a difference.
